title: The king of Denmark is waving a yellow star.
subtitle: The myth of the non-Jewish Danes who donate yellow stars in solidarity with the Jews during the Nazi occupation of Denmark is an impressive but historically inaccurate story.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: When the Germans in occupied Denmark ordered the Jews to identify themselves by wearing armbands with yellow stars during World War II, the tenth Christian king of Denmark and the non-Jewish Danes foiled the system.
